net.nanopool
Class Settings

java.lang.Object
  net.nanopool.Settings

public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object

Settings is an atomically mutable container of attributes that describes to a NanoPoolDataSource how it should operate. The Settings instance can be safely mutated after a NanoPoolDataSource has been created using it.

Since:
1.0
Author:
cvh
